message: A fair start, let's see if you can do better!
You started high, I'll try to meet you in the middle!
You went low, I'll meet you halfway this time!
You're getting closer, but I'm not giving up yet!
You're getting closer, but I'm not giving up either!
I'm not budging, it's time for you to make a serious offer!
I'm not giving up yet, let's see if you'll meet me at the end!
You're getting desperate, it's time to make a real concession!
I'm not giving up, let's see if you'll make a serious concession this time!
I'm not budging, you're getting close to walking away with nothing!
I'm not giving up yet, but I'm getting close to walking away!
You're walking away with nothing, congratulations! I get it all!
I guess I'm walking away with nothing. Congratulations, Bob!
